articles.title: Marco Sturm’s faith in Marat Khusnutdinov gets rewarded with Bruins OT winner
articles.description:
"He worked really hard in practice, and he just waited for his opportunity and then he took advantage."

The post Marco Sturm’s faith in Marat Khusnutdinov gets rewarded with Bruins OT winner appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marat Khusnutdinov scored the game-winning goal for the Bruins in overtime.
Marco Sturm praised Khusnutdinov's hard work and readiness for the opportunity.
This victory boosts Bruins' morale and strengthens their playoff positioning.

articles.title: Why Dan Orlovsky believes Drake Maye is NFL MVP frontrunner
articles.description:
"Drake Maye’s playing quarterback just about as good as anybody, with the least amount of help around him when it comes to just talent."

The post Why Dan Orlovsky believes Drake Maye is NFL MVP frontrunner appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dan Orlovsky praises Drake Maye's performance as a top NFL MVP candidate.
Maye is excelling despite limited talent surrounding him, highlighting his skills.
Boston residents may see increased interest in Maye as a future Patriots target.
